alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Logan; McLean; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Logan, northwestern De Witt, southeastern Tazewell and southwestern McLean Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hartsburg, or near Lincoln, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lincoln around 405 PM CDT. Atlanta around 415 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 0 and 11. Interstate 55 between mile markers 123 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
